title: Remove Your Data
subtitle: Select what you'd like to remove from Beancounter. This action cannot be undone.

summary.title: Your Data Summary
summary.description: Here's a summary of your data in Beancounter. You can choose what to delete in the following steps.
summary.warning: Data deletion is permanent and cannot be undone. Please review carefully before proceeding.

wealth.title: Delete Wealth Data
wealth.description: Your wealth data includes portfolios, custom assets, and all associated transactions.
wealth.checkbox: Delete all my portfolios and custom assets
wealth.checkboxDescription: This will delete all portfolios, custom assets (like real estate), and their transaction history.
wealth.warningDescription: All your portfolio and asset data will be permanently deleted, including transaction history.
wealth.noData: You don't have any portfolios or custom assets to delete.

planning.title: Delete Planning Data
planning.description: Your planning data includes retirement plans and model portfolios for rebalancing.
planning.plansDescription: This will delete your independence plans and their expense breakdowns.
planning.modelsDescription: This will delete your rebalancing models and their allocation plans.
planning.warningDescription: Your retirement plans and rebalancing models will be permanently deleted.
planning.noData: You don't have any retirement plans or model portfolios to delete.

account.title: Delete Account
account.description: Optionally, you can delete your entire Beancounter account. This will remove all your data and log you out.
account.checkboxDescription: This will delete all your data including portfolios, assets, plans, models, preferences, and your user account.
account.warningDescription: Your account will be permanently deleted. You will be logged out and will need to register again to use Beancounter.
account.noSelections: Please select at least one item to delete, or delete your entire account.

complete.title: Deletion Complete
complete.description: The selected data has been successfully removed from Beancounter.
complete.accountDeleted: Your account has been deleted. Please log out to complete the process.
